title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 79.1 - Accounting
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 79.1 - Accounting

State Regulations

The accounting for all money collected and distributed
pursuant to the provisions of article 7 of the Agriculture and Markets Law or
any local law or ordinance enacted pursuant thereto shall be in accordance with
the accounting system prescribed by the State Comptroller. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
79.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
